bibl.title: The Martyria of Saints: The Wall-Paintings of the Church of St. Anthony in the Eastern Desert.
bibl.note: Concerne plusieurs saints vénérés en Égypte, entre autres saint Ménas.

bibl.title: Medieval and Middle Eastern Studies in Honor of Aziz Suryah Atiya

bibl.seg: Meinardus Otto F.A., The Martyria of Saints: The Wall-Paintings of the Church of St. Anthony in the Eastern Desert.
Medieval and Middle Eastern Studies in Honor of Aziz Suryah Atiya (Leiden, 1972) pp. 311-343, 6 figg., 14 pll.
Concerne plusieurs saints vénérés en Égypte, entre autres saint Ménas.
